testcase.name: To test Ira chat workflows for accuracy of results and overall experience.

failure.message: The scenario has pending or undefined step(s)

testcase.failure: Given user is already on Test agent IRA page................................undefined When the user clicks on Notification........................................undefined And the user gets into the bot..............................................undefined And user types Hello greeting message.......................................undefined Then a response message is displayed........................................undefined And user clicks Start Over button from the Menu Options.....................undefined And user selects Download Motor Policy option is clicked....................undefined And user clicks on download.................................................undefined And user types Test Bot.....................................................undefined And user fills the form with Manager values.................................undefined And user types New Test.....................................................undefined And user clicks on Google...................................................undefined And user closes the web view................................................undefined And user clicks on Call.....................................................undefined And user closes the call popup..............................................undefined
